abstract: The Yankees honored the outgoing traininer Gene Monahan with a video tribute after being eliminated from the playoffs.
snippet: The Yankees honored the outgoing traininer Gene Monahan with a video tribute after being eliminated from the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Despite suffering a crushing loss in Game 5 of their American League division series to the Detroit Tigers, the Yankees did not lose their sense of class, remembering to honor one of their longest-serving employees.
